hes: Proactively performs all HES training pertinent to management of a new project equipment asset base.
积极参与所有与新项目设备资产相关的HES培训.
HES cell cultures have to be closely watched to remove any of these spontaneously differentiated colonies.
因此,必须密切观察培养的HES细胞,并随时去掉自发分化的细胞集落.
Fine - tuning their nano - micro topography could boost the efficiency of HES cell propagation.
而对HES细胞 生长基质表面形貌的精雕细琢,将大大增加其繁殖效率.
